description: Flicktapular is a fun game where you tap and flick different shapes to earn points.  As you progress through the 10 different levels, the game speeds up, and you must earn more points to pass each level.  Compete against other people by uploading your high scores to the Global High Scores List.  Flicktapular offers 19 achievements that you can unlock as you play.   It also tracks your overall statistics so you can see how many times you've tapped and flicked! Whether you want to casually kill a few minutes while waiting in line, or you want to competitively play for 30 minutes to earn those extra few points, Flicktapular is the game for you!
